verses.kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
verses.web: Stand firm therefore in the liberty by which Christ has made us free, and don’t be entangled again with a yoke of bondage.
verses.ct: So stand firm in the freedom that Christ has given us, and don't let anyone drag you back under the yoke of slavery to the law.

verses.kjv: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.
verses.web: Behold, I, Paul, tell you that if you receive circumcision, Christ will profit you nothing.
verses.ct: Listen carefully — I, Paul, am telling you this: if you get circumcised to earn God's approval, then Christ does you no good at all.

verses.kjv: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.
verses.web: Yes, I testify again to every man who receives circumcision that he is a debtor to do the whole law.
verses.ct: Let me say it again to every man who gets circumcised: you are now obligated to obey every single part of the law.

verses.kjv: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.
verses.web: You are alienated from Christ, you who desire to be justified by the law. You have fallen away from grace.
verses.ct: If you're trying to be made right with God through the law, you've cut yourselves off from Christ. You've fallen away from grace.

verses.kjv: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.
verses.web: For we, through the Spirit, by faith wait for the hope of righteousness.
verses.ct: But we, through the Holy Spirit and by faith, eagerly wait for the righteousness we hope for.

verses.kjv: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.
verses.web: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision amounts to anything, nor uncircumcision, but faith working through love.
verses.ct: When you belong to Christ Jesus, it doesn't matter whether you're circumcised or not. The only thing that matters is faith expressing itself through love.

verses.kjv: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?
verses.web: You were running well! Who interfered with you that you should not obey the truth?
verses.ct: You were doing so well! Who got in your way and kept you from following the truth?

verses.kjv: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.
verses.web: This persuasion is not from him who calls you.
verses.ct: Whatever convinced you to turn aside didn't come from the one who called you.

verses.kjv: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.
verses.web: A little yeast grows through the whole lump.
verses.ct: A little yeast works its way through the whole batch of dough.

verses.kjv: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.
verses.web: I have confidence toward you in the Lord that you will think no other way. But he who troubles you will bear his judgment, whoever he is.
verses.ct: I'm confident in the LORD that you'll come around to seeing things the right way. But whoever is stirring up confusion among you will face God's judgment, no matter who he is.

verses.kjv: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.
verses.web: But I, brothers, if I still preach circumcision, why am I still persecuted? Then the stumbling block of the cross has been removed.
verses.ct: Brothers, if I were still preaching that circumcision is necessary, why would anyone still persecute me? If that were my message, the cross wouldn't offend anyone.

verses.kjv: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.
verses.web: I wish that those who disturb you would cut themselves off.
verses.ct: I wish the people who are upsetting you would go all the way and cut themselves off entirely!

verses.kjv: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
verses.web: For you, brothers, were called for freedom. Only don’t use your freedom for gain to the flesh, but through love be servants to one another.
verses.ct: Brothers, you were called to be free. But don't use your freedom as an excuse to give in to your sinful nature. Instead, serve one another through love.

verses.kjv: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
verses.web: For the whole law is fulfilled in one word, in this: “You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”
verses.ct: The entire law can be summed up in one command: "Love your neighbor as yourself."

verses.kjv: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
verses.web: But if you bite and devour one another, be careful that you don’t consume one another.
verses.ct: But if you keep tearing each other apart like wild animals, watch out — you'll end up destroying each other completely.

verses.kjv: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
verses.web: But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you won’t fulfill the lust of the flesh.
verses.ct: Here's what I'm saying: let the Holy Spirit guide your life, and you won't give in to the desires of your sinful nature.

verses.kjv: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
verses.web: For the flesh lusts against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; and these are contrary to one another, that you may not do the things that you desire.
verses.ct: Your sinful nature craves what the Spirit opposes, and the Spirit desires what your sinful nature fights against. They are constantly at war with each other, so you can't simply do whatever you want.

verses.kjv: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.
verses.web: But if you are led by the Spirit, you are not under the law.
verses.ct: But if the Spirit is leading you, you are not under the law.

verses.kjv: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,
verses.web: Now the deeds of the flesh are obvious, which are: adultery, sexual immorality, uncleanness, lustfulness,
verses.ct: The acts of the sinful nature are obvious: adultery, sexual immorality, impurity, shameless behavior,

verses.kjv: Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,
verses.web: idolatry, sorcery, hatred, strife, jealousies, outbursts of anger, rivalries, divisions, heresies,
verses.ct: idolatry, sorcery, hatred, conflict, jealousy, explosive anger, selfish ambition, division, false teaching,

verses.kjv: Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.
verses.web: envy, murders, drunkenness, orgies, and things like these; of which I forewarn you, even as I also forewarned you, that those who practice such things will not inherit God’s Kingdom.
verses.ct: envy, murder, drunkenness, wild partying, and things like these. I'm warning you now, just as I warned you before: people who make a habit of living this way will not inherit God's Kingdom.

verses.kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
verses.web: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith,
verses.ct: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith,

verses.kjv: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
verses.web: gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law.
verses.ct: gentleness, and self-control. There is no law against any of these things.

verses.kjv: And they that are Christ’s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
verses.web: Those who belong to Christ have crucified the flesh with its passions and lusts.
verses.ct: Those who belong to Christ Jesus have nailed their sinful nature to the cross, along with all its passions and desires.

verses.kjv: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
verses.web: If we live by the Spirit, let’s also walk by the Spirit.
verses.ct: Since we live by the Spirit, let's keep in step with the Spirit.

verses.kjv: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
verses.web: Let’s not become conceited, provoking one another, and envying one another.
verses.ct: Let's not become arrogant, provoking each other and being jealous of one another.
